description:
FIR (Finite Impulse Response) filter for preset processing layer.

# Internal Type Used in **preset processing layer** from factory presets. Part of speaker model voicing. Path: `/audio/output/speaker/1/preset/fir`

# Purpose Factory-tuned FIR filters that define speaker's frequency response. Contains: - Driver voicing curves - Phase linearization - Cabinet compensation

# Structure - `bypass`: Enable/disable FIR filter (usually not bypassed in factory presets) - `taps`: FIR coefficient array (float32, max 2048 taps)

# Preset Locking When preset is vendor-locked (encrypted), FIR taps are hidden from API responses. Only bypass state is visible/modifiable.

taps.description: Factory FIR filter coefficients (max 2048 taps, may be locked/hidden)

title: PresetFirFilter
